撩.definition: to tease; to provoke; to stir up (emotions)

撩亂.definition: variant of 繚亂|缭乱[liao2 luan4]

撩妹.definition: (coll.) to flirt; to hit on girls

撩是生非.definition: to stir up trouble; to provoke angry exchange

撩起.definition: to raise; to lift up (curtains, clothing etc)

撩開.definition: to push aside (clothing, curtain etc) to reveal something; to toss aside
